sentences.en: " I'm with the company at the Casino now. "
sentences.cn: “ 现在,我是在卡西诺戏院演出的剧团的演员. ”

sentences.en: " Is it the Casino show you told me about? "
sentences.cn: “ 是不是你告诉过我的要在卡西诺戏院上演的那出戏? ”

sentences.en: Carrie saw the manager at the Casino once.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉见到了一次卡西诺戏院的经理.

sentences.en: Doesn’t that club have a casino upstairs?
sentences.cn: 那家俱乐部楼上不是有赌场吗？

sentences.en: He dropped 1000 francs at the casino last night.
sentences.cn: 他昨夜在赌场输了1000法郎.

sentences.en: He was in the casino and started to make a bundle.
sentences.cn: 他常出入赌场,并开始发财了.

sentences.en: I lost a whole lot of money at the casino.
Michael said reasonably, " Your casino has been losing money against all the odds.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔讲起道理来.他说: “你那个赌场一直在折本,把别的方面赚到的钱都填进去了.

sentences.en: Monday Carrie went again to the Casino.
sentences.cn: 星期一,嘉莉又去了卡西诺戏院.

sentences.en: Now, as on each preceding day, letters were handed her by the doorman at the Casino.
sentences.cn: 现在, 像前些天一样, 每天卡西诺戏院的门房都要把一些信件交给她.

sentences.en: So I took myself to the casino.
The Casino, where she had often danced, had suffered a similar fate.
sentences.cn: 她经常跳舞的赌场遭遇了相似的命运。

sentences.en: Their taste for gambling has endeared them to Las Vegas casino owners.
sentences.cn: 他们因好赌而深受拉斯维加斯赌场老板的欢迎。

sentences.en: With your casino losing money we're doing you a favor. "
sentences.cn: 你那个赌场在折本.我们接管过来,也是为你好嘛. ”

sentences.en: You'd do better to use your energy to find out why the casino is losing money.
sentences.cn: 你最好把你的精力用在研究赌场为什么折本这个问题上.

sentences.en: You're sending me into an lndian casino dressed like a cowboy.
sentences.cn: 你让我打扮成牛仔进入印第安赌场?

trans.tran_en: a place where people try to win money by playing card games or  roulette
